transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Haan Chaudhary sahab Himanshu baat kar raha hu business India mart se.

Customer: Haan boliye.

Executive: Ji ji Khushi aur Richa ji ka senior se hu sir kya sir performa ek approve hua tha TrustSeal ki services ke liye to wo aaj payment karne wala tha to hua nahi sir kahi pe koi gap aa raha hai sir product mein ya fir kuch.

Customer: Haan main kamar hu main main bar bar bar call mat kariye aapka team ka din mein 10 mein koi customer mein kaun se mode mein ya main kahan khada hu main kahan hu call ke upar call unko bolna aise mat kariye.

Executive: Haan haan isiliye sir unhone aapne bola hua hai.

Customer: Aap unko bol dijiye aisa nahi hai aisa nahi hai ki tumko kya teen bar unka to wahi kam hai kya call karna.

Customer: Jab ek bar bol diya ki main mera busy hu.

Executive: Hmm hmm.

Customer: Haan bar bar call karenge kaun baat karega unse.

Executive: Nahi nahi thik hai it's okay apun ko communicate kar dete to nahi karenge aisa kuch bhi nahi hai ki aap aapne kal bola tha to humne kiya nahi call aaj bhi kiya hai.

Customer: Sir maine are message mein aa gaya tha na aap samajh lo aapka koi matter hai aap koi serious aapka koi rahega hospital mein aap aur aap bar bar call karunga main aap uthayenge kya.

Executive: Nahi nahi bilkul nahi uthayenge sir.

Customer: Nahi unko bol dijiye ki yahi yahi kam dhandha hai kya tumko.

Executive: Hmm jab maine message likh ke bhej diya.

Executive: Thik hai.

Customer: Aisa mat kariye aisa harkat wrong.

Executive: Haan its wrong totally wrong matlab aap communication clarity clear hona chahiye jo bhi.

Customer: Nahi aap bhi aap aise mode mein rahega main call karunga aap kya karoge mere se kya baat karoge bataiye aap.

Executive: Nahi koi baat to nahi ho payegi na sir clarity hi nahi rahegi koi cheez ki matlab koi wo ho hi nahi payega.

Customer: Ek karti hai dusri karti hai teesri karti hai are main bhi hazar logo ko charata tum D mart ka kya ho gaye.

Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.

Customer: Jab usko maine message dal ke bol diya to tere ko kya karna hai mere ko mera kam hai na mere ko product lena nahi lena.

Executive: Ji ji bilkul sir.

Customer: Haan kam to aapka hi hai.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Hmm to aisa unko bol dijiye.

Executive: Thik hai main baat kar sakta hu but kab connect karna hai aap bata dijiye.

Customer: Main main call karunga tab connect kijiye thik hai.

Executive: Okay sir thik hai pricing ko lekar wo fir baad mein change hoga wo dekh lijiyega aap.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is getting frequent calls from IndiaMART.

- Customer was busy and sent a message.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Executive assured no further calls will be made.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call when available.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- calls, trustseal, payment, communication
